participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and a bit shy, Oliver has a vivid imagination and often feels isolated despite his creative thoughts.
participant_1.background: He lives in a cozy home filled with toys and fluffy things, but struggles to make friends in his neighborhood.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and friendly, Sophia loves to connect with others and often tries to uplift those who feel alone.
participant_2.background: Growing up in a warm household, she often reaches out to those in need of companionship, believing that everyone deserves a friend.

content.text: It's so fluffy in my home
I have a superpower to freze time
And you don't talk to me
